title: Kerma
overview: Kerma tells the story of Riku â€“ a young man who seeks revenge by infiltrating a group of the young finnish- elite. He plans to steal from the upper- echelons of society and settle his debt with the local drug-lord. However, to Riku's surprise he finds himself feeling a genuine connection with the rich heiress, Linda and soon he falls hard in love with her despite everything. This leaves Riku at a crossroads; his double life has left him feeling torn between the loyalty for his depressed brother and the newfound love he feels for Linda. But what happens when the mask is ripped off, when the truth is exposed and the lies brought to light?Are you ready for a series that will keep you on the edge of your seat? Kerma is a suspense-driven series set in a jet-set environment, exploring themes as pride, love and loyalty. Through the eyes of the main character, Riku, we see how people can hide their dark sides behind a false facade, and the brutal contrast between the privileged and the poor. So, if you are looking for a thrilling series, do not miss out on DECEPTION.
